title: game won't let me get in?
body: so I just got into a rank game, and it doesn't go onto the loading screen, i keep clicking reconnect on the client but it gets out of the client and the game doesnt load..... I'm going to lose lp for this!

replies.body:
Check out my post, similar symptoms?
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/WyLVUBOK-severe-bug-that-can-effect-anybody-by-the-looks-not-the-firewall-bug-urgent-ban-immenent
